CreateApmInstance.document: This API is used to create a business purchase in the APM business system.
CreateApmInstance.name: Creates an apm business system

CreateApmPrometheusRule.document: This API is used to create metric match rules between apm Business System and Prometheus Instance.
CreateApmPrometheusRule.name: Create a match rule for metrics between apm business system and Prometheus instance

CreateProfileTask.document: This API is used to create an event task.
CreateProfileTask.name: Create a performance analysis event task

DescribeApmApplicationConfig.document: This API is used to query application configuration.
DescribeApmApplicationConfig.name: Query application configuration

DescribeApmAssociation.document: This API is used to query the relationship between apm Business System and other product.
DescribeApmAssociation.name: Query the relationship between apm business system and other product

DescribeApmInstances.document: This API is used to obtain the list of APM business systems.
DescribeApmInstances.name: Retrieves a list of apm business systems

DescribeApmPrometheusRule.document: This API is used to query the match rule for metrics between apm Business System and Prometheus Instance.
DescribeApmPrometheusRule.name: Query the match rule for metrics between apm business system and Prometheus instance

DescribeApmServiceMetric.document: This API is used to obtain the list of APM application metrics.
DescribeApmServiceMetric.name: Retrieve APM application metrics

DescribeGeneralApmApplicationConfig.document: This API is used to query the application configuration information.
DescribeGeneralApmApplicationConfig.name: This api is used to query the application configuration information

DescribeGeneralMetricData.document:
This API is a general API used to obtain metric data. Users submit request parameters as needed and receive the corresponding metric data.
The API call frequency is limited to 20 requests per second and 1200 requests per minute. The number of data points per request is limited to 1440.
DescribeGeneralMetricData.name: General interface to obtain metric data (recommend)

DescribeGeneralOTSpanList.document: General Query OpenTelemetry Call Chain List.
DescribeGeneralOTSpanList.name: General query opentelemetry call chain list

DescribeMetricRecords.document: This API is used to query metric list. To query metrics, it is recommended to use the DescribeGeneralMetricData API.
DescribeMetricRecords.name: General metric list API

DescribeServiceOverview.document: This API is used to pull application overview data.
DescribeServiceOverview.name: Retrieves application overview data

DescribeTagValues.document: This API is used to query dimensional data by dimension name and filter condition.
DescribeTagValues.name: Queries tag data

ModifyApmAssociation.document: This API is used to modify the relationship between the apm Business System and other products, including deletion.
ModifyApmAssociation.name: Modify the relationship between apm business system and other product

ModifyApmInstance.document: This API is used to modify the APM business system.
ModifyApmInstance.name: Modifies the apm business system

ModifyApmPrometheusRule.document: This API is used to modify metric match rules between apm Business System and Prometheus Instance.
ModifyApmPrometheusRule.name: Modify the metrics match rule between the apm business system and Prometheus instance

ModifyGeneralApmApplicationConfig.document: OpenAPI available for external use. Customers can flexibly specify the fields to be modified, and then add the list of services to be modified.
ModifyGeneralApmApplicationConfig.name: Modifies application configuration information

APMKV.document: APM floating-point number type key-value pair.

members.document:
Whether allowlist configuration is enabled for the current API.
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.

members.document:
Effective when RetentionValid is false. It indicates blocklist configuration in API settings. The APIs specified in the configuration do not support collection.
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: IgnoreOperation

members.document:
Effective when RetentionValid is true. It indicates allowlist configuration in API settings. Only the APIs specified in the configuration support collection.
Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid values can be obtained.
members.name: RetentionOperation

members.document: The timestamp of the start time, supporting the query of metric data within 30 days. (unit: seconds).
members.name: StartTime

members.document: The timestamp of the end time, supporting the query of metric data within 30 days. (unit: seconds).
members.name: EndTime

members.document:
Whether to aggregate by a fixed time span: enter 1 for values of 1 and greater, and 0 if not filled in.
-If 0 is filled in, it calculates the metric data from the start time to the cutoff time.
- if 1 is filled in, the aggregation granularity will be selected according to the time span from the start time to the deadline:.
 -If the time span is (0,12) hours, it is aggregated by one-minute granularity.
 -If the time span is [12,48] hours, it is aggregated at a five-minute granularity.
 -If the time span is (48, +∞) hours, it is aggregated at an hourly granularity.
members.name: Period

members.document:
Sort query metrics.
Key: enter the tencentcloud api metric name. [for details, see](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/248/101681?from_cn_redirect=1) .
Value: specify the sorting method:.     
-Asc: sorts query metrics in ascending order.
- desc: sort query metrics in descending order.
members.name: OrderBy

members.document: Maximum number of queried metrics. currently, up to 50 data entries can be displayed. the value range for pagesize is 1-50. submit pagesize to show the limited number based on the value of pagesize.
members.name: PageSize

members.document: The unique request ID, generated by the server, will be returned for every request (if the request fails to reach the server for other reasons, the request will not obtain a RequestId). RequestId is required for locating a problem.

members.document:
Sort
.
The currently supported keys are:.

-StartTime (start time).
-EndTime (end time).
-Duration (response time).

The currently supported values are:.

- desc: sort in descending order.
-Asc - ascending order.
members.name: OrderBy

members.document: The service name of the business itself. console users should fill in taw.
members.name: BusinessName

members.document: Number of items per page, defaults to 10,000, valid value range is 0 – 10,000.
members.name: Limit

members.document:
The Spans field contains the entire content of the link data. since the data is compressed, perform the following three steps to switch back to the original text.
Decode the text in the Spans field with Base64 to get the compressed byte[].
Use gzip to decompress the compressed byte array and get the byte array before compression.
Uses UTF-8 character set to convert byte[] before compression to text.
members.name: Spans

members.document: Specifies the rule name to modify.

members.document: Applications where the rule takes effect. input an empty string for all applications. if this is not modified, pass the old rule.

members.document: Match type: 0 - precision match, 1 - prefix match, 2 - suffix match (if not modified, the old rule must be passed).
